instructions: put the dinner plate at the bottom centre of the table cloth
put the dinner fork to the left of the dinner plate
put the salad fork to the left of the dinner fork
put the dinner knife to the right of the dinner plate
put the salad knife to the right of the dinner knife
put the soup spoon to the right of the salad knife
put the water glass above the dinner knife
put the wine glass to the right of the water glass
put the wine glass to the right of the wine glass
put the coffee cup to the right of the soup spoon
put the bread plate above the dinner fork
put the butter knife on the bread plate, pointing top left
put the dessert fork above the dinner plate, pointing right
put the dessert spoon above the dessert fork, pointing left
put the napkin on the dinner plate
